description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Major Features and Improvements

* Ability to add event to Secondary Calendar of Office 365
* Bind Smtp Client to specific IP on source having multiple IPs
* Provide Insert method for adding Header at specific location

All Changes

Features

EMAILNET-35201 - Bind Smtp Client to specific IP on source having multiple IPs

Enhancements

EMAILNET-35192 - Saving EML has date with Weekday abbreviation
EMAILNET-35198 - Ability to add event to Secondary Calendar of Office 365
EMAILNET-35222 - Provide Insert method for adding Header at specific location

Bugs

EMAILNET-35188 - Exchange.Backup doesn't fetch more than 1000 emails
EMAILNET-35154 - IEWSClient object can't get created on Windows Service on Windows Server 2003
EMAILNET-35158 - Conversion of a Bad MIME to Good one
EMAILNET-35161 - ImapClient: Message Fetched from Office365 contains garbage characters instead of Special characters
EMAILNET-35189 - Saving MapiCalendar loses attachment from body
EMAILNET-35190 - Spaces removed preceding under line text in the message body
EMAILNET-35191 - EML loses image from Html with Base64 image
EMAILNET-35193 - To field missing email address while saving EML
EMAILNET-35194 - Garbage in Subject with specific encoding and Empty Body
EMAILNET-35195 - Error loading EML file
EMAILNET-35196 - Subject, From, To lost when Signed MapiMessage loaded to MailMessage
EMAILNET-35197 - EML-> MSG: Email body is missing
EMAILNET-35199 - Empty subject written to MIME by MailMessage
EMAILNET-35204 - Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64 changed to Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable while loading and saving EML
EMAILNET-35206 - Message signing: Missing certificate information and extra attachment at recepient end
EMAILNET-35207 - Problem with Signed messages in presence of attachment when new message is created
EMAILNET-35209 - Excel->Mht->EML/MSG: Graph is not made part of the Message
EMAILNET-35182 - Warning FirstChanceException: System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException
EMAILNET-35202 - Exception raised for MapiCalendarMonthlyRecurrencePattern Day value
EMAILNET-35219 - msg.ToMapiMessageItem raises Exception
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
